title: List of all Android tab bar  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android tab bar  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: NavigationTabBar
repoList.description: Navigation tab bar with colorful interactions.

repoList.name: NavigationTabStrip
repoList.description: Navigation tab strip with smooth interaction.

repoList.name: FoldingTabBar.Android
repoList.description: [DEPRECATED]  Folding Tabbar menu for Android. This is a menu library.You can easily add a nice animated tab menu to your app.

repoList.name: TabBarView
repoList.description: An Android Library to help you create actionbar tabs like "Capitaine train" app by Cyril Mottier

repoList.name: ReadableBottomBar
repoList.description: Yet another material bottom bar library for Android

repoList.name: iconic-tab-bar
repoList.description: Android TabView that follows Android BottomBar design pattern.

repoList.name: react-native-tab-bars
repoList.description: Fully customizable navigation tab bar for React Native

repoList.name: TabBarBug
repoList.description: Repository to display two potential bugs, one in the Android Design Support Library and the other in Android Studio
